metadata.synopsis: Astarion is enjoying himself at a party with the goblins. You've betrayed and slaughtered the tieflings and he's finally able to indulge his hedonistic side. He's drinking blood, but offers you wine. He or you can propose that you get together tonight and enjoy a little more hedonism when everyone else is asleep.

0.speaker: Astarion
0.text: Don't you love the silence after a massacre? It's just so pure.

60.speaker: Astarion
60.text: Certainly better than pillow talk with your drow lover, hmm?

17.speaker: Astarion
17.text: If you're here to beg forgiveness, save your breath. My cup and I are perfectly happy together.

36.speaker: Astarion
36.text: Well hello. Welcome to my humble party.
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: Pouring you a drink. You both pick up your cups.NodeContext: Pouring you a drink. You both pick up your cups.

173.context: CinematicNodeContext: Pouring you a drink. You both pick up your cups.NodeContext: Pouring you a drink. You both pick up your cups.

25.speaker: Astarion
25.text: You're a conquering hero and you want to drink foaming piss?
25.context: CinematicNodeContext: Pouring you a drink. You both pick up your cups.NodeContext: Pouring you a drink. You both pick up your cups.

13.speaker: Astarion
13.text: Not that I'm judging, of course.
13.context: CinematicNodeContext: Pouring you a drink. You both pick up your cups.NodeContext: Pouring you a drink. You both pick up your cups.

27.speaker: Astarion
27.text: So, what are we drinking to? Other than a pile of corpses.
27.context: CinematicNodeContext: Pouring you a drink. You both pick up your cups.NodeContext: Pouring you a drink. You both pick up your cups.

66.speaker: Astarion
66.text: Oh don't be so sour - it's a party.
66.context: CinematicNodeContext: Toasts and drinksNodeContext: Toasts and drinks

138.speaker: Astarion
138.text: You did what you had to. Don't be ashamed that you did it well.
138.context: CinematicNodeContext: Toasts and drinksNodeContext: Toasts and drinks

15.speaker: Player
15.text: I wish things had turned out differently.
15.context: CinematicNodeContext: Toasts and drinksNodeContext: Toasts and drinks

35.speaker: Astarion
35.text: And I wish I was drinking out of the skulls of everyone who's ever wronged me. Life is tough.
35.context: CinematicNodeContext: Toasts and drinksNodeContext: Toasts and drinks

70.speaker: Astarion
70.text: Although that's not to say we can't have a little fun.
70.context: CinematicNodeContext: Toasts and drinksNodeContext: Toasts and drinks

110.speaker: Astarion
110.text: And I wish I was drinking out of Cazador's skull. Life is tough.

109.speaker: Player
109.text: I'm not ashamed. I just don't feel like boasting about it.
109.context: CinematicNodeContext: Toasts and drinksNodeContext: Toasts and drinks

30.speaker: Astarion
30.text: Try it. You might have fun.
30.context: CinematicNodeContext: Toasts and drinksNodeContext: Toasts and drinks

34.speaker: Astarion
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Toasts and drinksNodeContext: Toasts and drinks

10.speaker: Astarion
10.text: So, I see Lae'zel's marked you as her territory.

92.speaker: Astarion
92.text: I just hope she leaves you in one piece. We can't take a tenday for you to recover from whatever her idea of 'fun' is.

2.speaker: Astarion
2.text: So, I see you and Shadowheart have a connection. It looks very sweet.

54.speaker: Astarion
54.text: Not what I'd call 'fun', or 'interesting', but sweet.

116.speaker: Player
116.text: I'm sure I'll have a good time.

169.speaker: Astarion
169.text: Good for you. As for me, I'm going to drink until I'm sure I won't hear you grunting in the bushes.

125.speaker: Astarion
125.text: Ha! No, it so rarely is. But it might be fun.

21.speaker: Astarion
21.text: Ha! No, my love, I'm not jealous of the beating our gith friend will give you.

24.speaker: Astarion
24.text: As for me, I'm going to drink until I know I won't hear you grunting in the bushes.
24.context: NodeContext: Toasts and drains his cup.

135.speaker: Astarion
135.context: NodeContext: Toasts and drains his cup.

76.speaker: Astarion
76.text: Ha! No, my love, you and Shadowheart can hold hands all you want. It means nothing to me.

119.speaker: Astarion
119.text: Ha! No, my love, I'm not jealous of the drow. You have all the fun you want - if you survive the night.

44.speaker: Astarion
44.text: So, I see you and the drow have been making eyes at each other.
44.context: NodeContext: Looking at player with lust

171.speaker: Astarion
171.text: She does seem like a fun romp. As long as she doesn't bite your head off halfway through the act.

63.speaker: Player
63.text: Are you offering anything better? Because I could be persuaded...

93.speaker: Astarion
93.text: So, has anyone in the camp caught your eye?
93.context: NodeContext: Looking at player with lust

55.speaker: Astarion
55.text: There's no better way to unwind after a long day of killing.

167.speaker: Player
167.text: Shadowheart is looking very good tonight...

147.speaker: Astarion
147.text: I'm sure she is. If you can trust her not to bite your head off once you've done the deed.

68.speaker: Astarion
68.text: Ha! You're braver than I thought.

182.speaker: Player
182.text: I was thinking about you, actually.

11.speaker: Player
11.text: No, I'll spend the night alone.

178.speaker: Astarion
178.text: Whatever makes you happy, I suppose. As long as you don't come scratching at my door.

129.speaker: Astarion
129.context: NodeContext: Looking at player with lust

29.speaker: Player
29.context: NodeContext: Can't believe how nieve you are

82.speaker: Astarion
82.text: By the hells. Sex, my dear. A night of passion.
82.context: NodeContext: Can't believe how nieve you are

106.speaker: Player
106.text: What would you like to happen?
106.context: NodeContext: It's sex. He means sex. Is it too subtle? Because it's sex he's talking about.

53.speaker: Player
53.text: What would you like to happen?
53.context: NodeContext: It's sex. He means sex. Is it too subtle? Because it's sex he's talking about.

136.speaker: Astarion
136.text: Oh, a little talking, a little drinking, and - once everyone else is asleep - we get to know each other.
136.context: NodeContext: It's sex. He means sex. Is it too subtle? Because it's sex he's talking about.

37.speaker: Player
37.text: We whip each other within an inch of our lives.
37.context: NodeContext: Subtle and seductive. Restrained flirtation.

56.speaker: Astarion
56.text: I can replace those brutal fantasies of yours with desires you'll find much harder to push away.

90.speaker: Player
90.text: Well, I'd planned to bed you...
90.context: NodeContext: Subtle and seductive. Restrained flirtation.

9.speaker: Astarion
9.text: Does Lae'zel know that? I saw how she looked at you earlier.

156.speaker: Astarion
156.text: I'd hate to get between the gith and her trophy. No, I think we'll end this evening as friends.

121.speaker: Astarion
121.text: Does Shadowheart know that? I saw how she looked at you earlier.

32.speaker: Astarion
32.text: I don't know what her idea of a good time is, but it seems to involve you. I'd hate to intrude.

87.speaker: Astarion
87.text: Does the drow know that? I saw how she looked at you earlier.

89.speaker: Astarion
89.text: Be careful with that one. Her idea of a good time probably involves biting your head off halfway through the act.

43.speaker: Astarion
43.text: Although I'm sure you'd know better than I would.

6.speaker: Astarion
6.text: Really? I thought you had other company planned this evening, and I'd hate to intrude.

50.speaker: Astarion
50.text: Well, I'd hate to get in the way of a well-laid plan. So to speak.

12.speaker: Astarion
12.text: Let's wait until things quieten down a bit. Once the others are asleep, we'll find each other.

57.speaker: Astarion
57.text: Indeed you will, my love. Indeed you will.

139.speaker: Player
139.text: On second thought, maybe we'd better not.

7.speaker: Astarion
7.text: Never listen to your second thoughts! They always spoil the fun.

51.speaker: Astarion
51.text: But fine. If you're determined to ruin your evening, I won't stop you.

100.speaker: Astarion
100.text: I'm flattered, but I think not. It's not you, you understand, it's me.

181.speaker: Player
181.text: Well, I'd planned to bed you...
